short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the ability to export your bid-it schedule in a way easily pasteable to the Lautman forms.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add an export button to bid-it that downloads a file with the list of all courses you signed up for, split by department. Each group of lines is easily paste-able to the word form. Exports all information except semester cause that's too hard :P. Export icons created by Freepik - Flaticon
